Text: Re Seismic Data via satellite Cc Ive just now had time to add some comments to your summary My comments are in the attachment which encorporates your work Greg Bob NRON To Gregory P CT Richard ReichardtEnron nron Communications Vince J CT cc Zimin CT Stinson CT Subject Seismic Data via satellite I have attached a background piece to brief oil traders on this subject prior to a possible meeting with them Please give me any comments on accuracy completeness and coverage of the areas we want to explore As a side note I found some info on the web stating current proven oil reserves are billion bbls Discovery of a billion bbl field would add only While we will pursue the trading advantage option it is not looking promising that it has great short term value given the long time frame and high cost of bringing deep water reserves to market Bob Lee
